Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA 1800 Chemistry Hemoglobin A1c_3 (A1c_3) Automated Pretreatment Assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Photometric measurement at 410 nm and 694 nm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA 1800 Chemistry Hemoglobin A1c_3 automated pretreatment assay for quantitative determination of HbA1c in whole blood for diabetes monitoring.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of Hemoglobin A1c, a diabetes marker, in whole blood on the ADVIA Chemistry systems; measurements used to monitor long-term care of persons with diabetes and A1c/total hemoglobin ratio calculation.
